data.name: Text
data.text: Biochemistry seeks to describe the structure, organization, and functions of living matter in molecular terms. Biochemistry focuses on processes happening at a molecular level.

data.name: Text
data.text: Cytogenetics is the branch of genetics that studies the structure and behavior of chromosomes and their relation to human disease and disease processes.

data.name: Text
data.text: Biochemistry seeks to describe the structure, organization, and functions of living matter in molecular terms. Biochemistry focuses on processes happening at a molecular level.

data.name: Text
data.text: Histopathologists work in the laboratory, both in partnership with laboratory scientists and doctors from other clinical specialties. They have an in-depth knowledge of both pathological and clinical aspects of disease.

data.name: Text
data.text: Hematology is practised by specialists in the field who deal with the diagnosis, treatment and overall management of people with blood disorders ranging from anemia to blood cancer.

data.name: Text
data.text: Clinical pathology covers a wide range of laboratory functions and is concerned with the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease. Clinical pathologists are healthcare providers with special training.
